resources:
Memory Test Room"
• The task takes approximately… minutes. • The task should be completed in one go, without breaks. • Please read the instructions all the way through. • All tasks must be completed. • To hear the instructions, you can click "Listen." • It is recommended to perform the task in a quiet room. Phone call Calendar Calendar Instructions Appointment with the eye doctor before Tuesday between 9:00 – 12:00 for one hour Take the grandchildren to story hour at the library on Wednesday at 16:00 Social gathering at the coffee shop on Tuesdays at 11:00 for two hours Gymnastics class at the community center on Sundays at 11:00 for one hour Attend a lecture on Thursday at 15:00 for one hour Go for a morning walk twice a week for at least one hour. An appointment with an ophthalmologist story time with grandchildren Meeting at the cafe Gymnastics class Hear a lecture morning walk 09:00 10:00 11:00 12:00 13:00 14:00 15:00 16:00 17:00 18:00 בשאלה הקרובה תצטרך למקם חפצים בחדרים שונים, בפניך התנסות קצרה בה תראה כיצד ניתן להחליף חדר ע"י לחיצה על הכפתורים של החדרים. Drag and place the seven objects in all three rooms as you would arrange them in your home. You need to remember the locations of the objects. When finished, click "Continue". In front of you are several objects. Drag only the objects that appeared previously and place them exactly as you did before. When finished, click "Continue". In front of you are several objects. Drag only the objects that appeared previously and place them exactly as you did before. When finished, click "Continue". Incoming call Beit rivka You have an appointment with the eye doctor before Tuesday between 09:00 – 12:00 for an hour and a half, take the grandchildren to story hour at the library on Wednesday at 16:00, additionally, you have a social gathering at the coffee shop on Tuesdays at 11:00 for two hours, gymnastics class at the community center on Sundays at 11:00 for an hour, attend a lecture on Thursday at 19:00 for an hour, and go for a morning walk twice a week for 30 minutes. what will you de? Before you is a set of hours of activities. What do you need to do to remember all the activities listed? You have several activities that you need to schedule in a timetable. To start the task, click Continue Time ended The time for this question is over, Thanks for the cooperation move on to the next question Bedroom Salon Kitchen I will talk with my family I will remember all I will use the calendar please place all activities You must enter the appointments in the scheduling system according to the instructions Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday please rate rate The rate is: How well do you think you will do in the task before you? How well do you feel you did in the assignment? Do you have all you need? Do you have all you need?
